x=raw_input()
a,b=x.split()
a=int(a)
b=int(b)
while(1):
    x=1
    y=1
    z=2
    i=0
    while(1):
        z=x+y
        x=y
        y=z
        if z>=a and z<=b:
            i=i+1
        elif z>b:
            break
            
    print i
    x=raw_input()
    a,b=x.split()
    a=int(a)
    b=int(b)
    if a==0 and b==0:
        break
